name: Snake versus Blocks
description:
Snake versus Block is an endless snake style game, where you have to break a block with snakes matching color. You controll it by touching snake and steering him with your finger - its that easy!

Break as many colorful blocks as you can and watch your score grow, while you avoid solid blocks - all with just one finger. The classic snake game reimagined for modern mobile devices!

Snake versus Block is the perfect game to play while you wait for the bus, on your bus or train ride home or to work. You can play this at any time and anywhere you want.

Try to beat the highscore! Snake versus Block features googles integrated leaderboards system. Be the best today, this week or be the all time best!

Show your achievements! Unlock 5 achievements by getting better at the game and reaching certain milestones!

Play offline! No internet connection required.

Share your score! Share your best score with your friends and challenge them!
